short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get designing. Customize web page text and share with others.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension for making and sharing changes to arbitrary web pages. 

Built to support collaborative copy editing within web development companies.

Use in-browser web page editor to edit any web page, remember changes and automatically apply changes next time you visit the site. 

Great for prototyping changes to your sites and demo-ing to others, no development required!
